PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Keep wand APS under 5.05/sec.
Bodyswap of Sacrifice effective trigger rate isn't calculated correctly by PoB. It thinks the spellslinger cooldown blocks the trigger which isn't the case. Raise Zombie and Bodyswap both trigger on each wand attack at whatever the attack speed is as long as its under the 5.05/sec cooldown threshold.
"Critical strike chance for spells" and "Critical strike multiplier for spell damage" does not scale explosion damage. Don't get baited. You need generic modifiers.
+1 Frenzy Charge Aukuna's Will - STONKS
